title: GNS3: Docker containers vs Virtual Machines
description: Why would you use Docker containers rather than Virtual Machines (VMs) in GNS3? Which is best? And which hypervisor should you use? VMware or VirtualBox? What about QEMU? Jeremy (creator of GNS3) shares his advice on what you should be using.   Docker Persistent containers:   #gns3 #docker #vmware
